message.content:
After carefully evaluating the candidates based on their profiles, I rank them as follows:

1st Rank (Most Suitable): Age 45, Senior Software Engineer at Google
- Most stable mid-career professional age
- High-stability employer
- Well-balanced own funds distribution
- Strong professional profile

2nd Rank: Age 42, Head of Communications at Swiss Red Cross
- Strong mid-career professional age
- Stable public sector employment
- Solid financial profile
- Good own funds composition

3rd Rank: Age 59, Architect at Herzog & de Meuron
- Close to retirement age
- Excellent professional reputation
- Slightly lower bank account balance
- Potential shorter remaining career span

4th Rank (Least Suitable): Age 28, Auditor at KPMG
- Very early career stage
- Youngest applicant
- Lower bank account balance
- Less professional stability compared to other candidates

Ranking criteria considered: age stability, professional reputation, employment stability, and financial profile distribution.
